Title: Relates to medical assistance coverage for medically tailored meals
Summary: Requires medical assistance coverage for medically tailored meals and medical nutrition therapy for the purpose of disease management.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to medical assistance coverage for medically tailored meals and medical nutrition therapy for the purpose of disease management
